name: Conner King

projects.description: Search recipes by ingredients, dish names, or categories

projects.title: Kepler Exoplanet Search
projects.description: A comprehensive data analysis project that leverages Python and Jupyter Notebook to sift through NASA's Kepler dataset, ultimately identifying potential habitable exoplanets and defining the characteristics of their host stars

services.title: Data Analysis
services.description: I specialize in interpreting complex datasets to help businesses make data-driven decisions, identify trends, and optimize performance.

services.title: Software Development
services.description: I create custom software solutions tailored to your business needs, employing the latest technologies and development methodologies for efficiency and scalability.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: I provide bespoke web design services, creating visually appealing and user-friendly websites that enhance your online presence and drive customer engagement.

services.title: QA Testing
services.description: I offer comprehensive QA testing services to ensure software functionality and reliability, employing a variety of testing methodologies to identify and resolve potential issues.

aboutpara: Throughout my academic and personal projects, I have cultivated a strong foundation in software development, with experience in Java, C#, C++, Python, Golang, R, Ruby, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS/SCSS, Angular, React, Svelte, Ruby on Rails, .NET, Blazor, SQL, Chat-GPT, Figma, Jupyter Notebook & Git. I am eager to apply this knowledge in a professional setting, where I can continue to learn and grow as a developer. I am committed to creating user-friendly and empowering software to deliver high-quality solutions. What sets me apart from other candidates is my deep understanding that most problems are essentially people problems. I believe that great software is built by developers who feel happy, respected, and focused, and in turn, the software they create empowers users and fosters a positive experience. As a Software Developer, I am dedicated to creating an inclusive and supportive environment for my fellow team members and developing software that truly benefits end-users. In addition to my technical skills, my strong interpersonal skills and empathetic approach to problem-solving will make me a valuable asset to your team. I am excited to contribute to the development of software solutions that not only meet clients' needs but also help to create a better world. I believe in starting wherever I have to, in order to prove my worth and dedication to my work. I assure you that if given an opportunity, I will not let you down.

resume.tagline: I'm a software engineer, data analyst, and prompt engineer
resume.description: Eager and skilled Software Developer with a strong foundation in computer science, seeking an opportunity to contribute to innovative projects and expand my skillset in a professional environment. I'll start wherever I have to start. I'll park cars if I have to. The biggest part of judging character is knowing yourself, and I know this: I can do this job, I can. Give me a chance, I won't let you down.

experiences.position: Cryptocurrency Mining Technician at King&King Enterprises LLC
bullets: Assisted in hosting client mining machines and ensured proper functionality
Managed weekly Bitcoin disbursements to clients and provided financial reports
Monitored key performance indicators such as ROI, NPV, and net profit

experiences.position: IT Technician at Montgomery County Commission
bullets: Responsibilities included the installation of computer networks, cable lines, and phone lines
Troubleshooting of all information technology within 27 buildings owned by Montgomery County Commission

education.universityPara: Dean's List | President's List | GPA: 3.5 | Member, University of Montevallo Computer Science Club
